Reinforcement Learning, on the other hand, learns through experience, not just next-token prediction, and does so with drastically less compute.
From RLHF to robotics, RL opens doors that LLMs simply canâ€™t.
This post is a simple, practical roadmap for anyone curious about how RL works, why it matters, and where it might take us.
